name: Record.Recording
desc: A recorded sequence of outputs, followed by a completion value.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Set up a recording in a state ready to receive output.

items.name: init(output: [Output], completion: Subscribers.Completion<Failure>)
items.desc: Set up a complete recording with the specified output and completion.

items.name: var completion: Subscribers.Completion<Failure>
items.desc: The completion which will be sent to a Subscriber.

items.name: var output: [Output]
items.desc: The output which will be sent to a Subscriber.

items.name: func receive(Record<Output, Failure>.Recording.Input)
items.desc: Add an output to the recording.

items.name: func receive(completion: Subscribers.Completion<Failure>)
items.desc: Add a completion to the recording.
